wikipedia_page.main: Ricardo de Niro German (born 13 January 1999) is a professional footballer who plays as a striker for Dulwich Hamlet, on loan from League Two side Crawley Town. Born in England, he represents the Grenada national team.

response: He is the older brother of former Chesterfield and current Crawley Town forward Ricky German.
